headline: U.S. commercial insurance rates continue to rise, moderating to 5.6% increase
summary: Commercial Lines Insurance Pricing Survey: Q4 2024NEW YORK, March 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- U.S. commercial insurance rates showed a continued upward trend with signs of moderation in the fourth quarter of 2024, according to the latest findings from WTW's Commercial Lines Insurance Pricing Survey (CLIPS). The survey compares premiums for policies underwritten during the fourth quarter of 2024 to those for the same coverage in the respective quarter of 2023, providing a year-over-year perspect
